## createControllerFactoryForClass() function

Create a controller factory function for a given class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function createControllerFactoryForClass<T>(controllerCtor: ControllerClass<T>): ControllerFactory<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  controllerCtor | <code>ControllerClass&lt;T&gt;</code> | Controller class |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ControllerFactory<T>`
